global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_transition=”on”]

Zero Exclusion, Zero Carbon, Zero Poverty

[/et_pb_slide][/et_pb_fullwidth_slider][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.17.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.17.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.17.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.4″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

In 2022, the 3Zero World Forum – Zero Exclusion, Zero Carbon, Zero Poverty reaffirmed its mobilisation mandate: to provide everyone, citizens and organisations alike, with the means and tools to think and to act differently in order to combine social justice and ecological transition. On the 5th and 6th of September, Convergences and their partners invited changemakers from around the world to gather and find, collectively, solutions to the challenges of our time.

The Forum took place once again both online and onsite in Paris, gathering several thousands of people from 55 different countries to attend the event. This edition gave a special place to new interactive formats and the ever-growing desire to bring out concrete solutions by encouraging the attendees to join forces on common projects.

excerpt.rendered: Zero Exclusion, Zero Carbon, Zero Poverty In 2022, the 3Zero World Forum – Zero Exclusion, Zero Carbon, Zero Poverty reaffirmed its mobilisation mandate: to provide everyone, citizens and organisations alike, with the means and tools to think and to act differently in order to combine social justice and ecological transition. On the 5th and 6th […]
